title: Nightly Complier error "should have just one matching element"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code Some code that uses crate `guppy@0.7.2` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu installed - rustc 1.60.0-nightly (0c292c966 2022-02-08) ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling guppy v0.7.2 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Collection VecMap( [ ( OpaqueTypeKey { def_id: DefId(0:250 ~ guppy[2229]::graph::build::{impl#4}::resolve::{opaque#0}), substs: [ ReStatic, ReEarlyBound(0, 'g), ReFree(DefId(0:248 ~ guppy[2229]::graph::build::{impl#4}::resolve), BrNamed(DefId(0:249 ~ guppy[2229]::graph::build::{impl#4}::resolve::'a), 'a)), ], }, impl std::iter::Iterator, ), ( OpaqueTypeKey { def_id: DefId(0:250 ~ guppy[2229]::graph::build::{impl#4}::resolve::{opaque#0}), substs: [ ReStatic, ReEarlyBound(0, 'g), ReFree(DefId(0:248 ~ guppy[2229]::graph::build::{impl#4}::resolve), BrNamed(DefId(0:249 ~ guppy[2229]::graph::build::{impl#4}::resolve::'a), 'a)), ], }, impl std::iter::Iterator, ), ], ) should have just one matching element', /rustc/0c292c9667f1b202a9150d58bdd2e89e3e803996/compiler/rustc_data_structures/src/vec_map.rs:73:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fc7e56039fc - clone 43: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.60.0-nightly (0c292c966 2022-02-08) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [type_of] computing type of `graph::build::::resolve::{opaque#0}` #1 [check_mod_item_types] checking item types in module `graph::build` #2 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate end of query stack error: could not compile `guppy` warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: failed to compile `semantic-release-rust v1.0.0-alpha.8`, intermediate artifacts can be found at `/tmp/cargo-installRzF03e` Caused by: build failed Error: Process completed with exit code 101. ``` ``` ```

--- I noticed that my github actions failed while trying to compile `guppy` with the nightly compiler Github CI Run: https://github.com/hasezoey/new_string_template/runs/5122745994
